Package ch.usi.hse.exceptions

Class ApiExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • ch.usi.hse.exceptions.ApiExceptionHandler
  • @Order(-2147483648)
@ControllerAdvice
public class ApiExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    Author:
    robert.jans@usi.ch
